title: BRIEF-Taiwan's HTC posts Q3 net loss at T$4.48 bln
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's HTC posts Q3 net loss at T$4.48 bln 
Oct 5 HTC Corp 
* Says Q3 net loss after tax at T$4.48 billion ($137.63 million) 
Source text for Eikon:
